Magic Notes:
Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1, W2
School Specialization (Conjuration): Extra Conjuration spell/dy each spell level
Simple Somatics: No arcane spell failure in light armor
Wisdom Cleric Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1
Wisdom Druid Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level D1
Wisdom Paladin Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level P1
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Countersong: R30' Perform check vs. sonic magic while performing for 10 rd
Detect Evil: Detect Evil at will
Empower Spell: x1.5 chosen spell variable effects uses +2 spell slot
Empowered Knowledge: +1 caster level on Divination spells
Fascinate: R90' Hold 2 creatures spellbound while performing for 4 rd (DC Perform Will neg)
Inspire Competence: R30' Allies +2 skill checks while performing for 2 min
Inspire Courage: Allies +1 attack, damage, charm and fear saves while performing + 5 rd
School Opposition (Enchantment): Cannot learn or cast Enchantment spells
School Opposition (Necromancy): Cannot learn or cast Necromancy spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: Cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Spontaneous Druid Spell: Cast Summon Nature's Ally in place of known spell
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
Notes
Animal Companion: Owl "Nogohomil"
Animal Companion Features: Companion Evasion; Link; Share Spells
